title: (x) 'Bee Guide' Victorian caps - similar to Gable Antique {Mike Y}
content:
Does anyone know if there is a font out there that is similar to this that I found on a guide to bees book?

Many Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Photo-108.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202030731/http:/typophile.com/files/Photo-108.jpg) | 11.56 KB |
author: Scott Waring

comments.content:
[[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/gable-antique-condensed-sg/|Gable Antique Condensed]] is a revival of this old Victorian-era typeface.

- Mike Yanega

Thank you very much for you're help, I've been looking for a typeface such as this for quite some time :D

Thanks again,

All the best,

Scott
